messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] here's one for you
messages.messageBody:
Hi Robyn and all
<< I will jump in with you guys, Im 39 I have 7 children and we are driving
a
Dodge Caravan, we definetly need a bigger van. I like the Astro or Safari's.
Even better an Expedition. ( Ohh just dreaming.......) Robyn
>>

You sound just like me, Robyn. I'm 38 with 7 children. We have a big old
full-size Chevy van. But, I repeat, it's VERY OLD and the driver's side
floorboard is rusting through and it has over 140K miles. So, we're looking
too but everything is SOOO expensive and I hate pouring a lot of resources
into a vehicle! But, I guess it's a necessary evil. Especially when you
live in a rural area, like we do. We also have a Honda Civic for commuting
which gets used a lot more than the van! Take care!
Carol from WI
